title: WHAT IS THIS?!?!
body:
> Enchantment: Devourer
> - Base magic damage on hit lowered to 25 from 30.
> - Number of stacks for transformation increased to 35 from 30.

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Vo1vZIuhxp0/VtJf3MrqPSI/AAAAAAAA4a8/dcY9wn2dDgA/s1600/devvv.png

RITO DOING SENSEABLE BALANCING AFTER SO LONG?!?!

http://38.media.tumblr.com/2727e0cfc81896d71a73f08b143df6cd/tumblr_njq52osuic1u7591ko4_250.gif

edit: The dream was short lived

> - Base damage **reverted** to 30 from 25
> - Stacks to transform **reverted** to 30 from 35
> - Stacks given for Rift Herald kill reduced to 2 

At least rift herald got changed to the scuttler value...
